summary: This a saved game of mine Level 25 Nord . It's a recreation of the real-life me... Well.. Close enough. He is a hunter. You start out with a Hunting bow(Flawless), Iron Dagger (Superior) and Hide armor(Superior). Skills have been aimed toward One-handed, Archery, Sneak, Alchemy and alil into Light-Armor. I'm sharing him with you all. Now..
descriptionHtml: This a saved game of mine Level 25 Nord . It's a recreation of the real-life me... Well.. Close enough. He is a hunter. You start out with a Hunting bow(Flawless), Iron Dagger (Superior) and Hide armor(Superior). Skills have been aimed toward One-handed, Archery, Sneak, Alchemy and alil into Light-Armor. I'm sharing him with you all. Now.. No quests have been done so... You're free to do what ever with him. This character is out to a great start for those who wish to do Side-Main quests like the Dark Brotherhood or Thieves Guild... OR you can use him for roleplay... Doing hunter related quests. Sorry for no pic.
author: Lazygamer
